title: Duck breast à l'orange
ingredients: ['2 duck breasts', 'pinch of sea salt', '235ml chicken stock', '2 tablespoons orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)', '1 tablespoon sherry vinegar', '1 tablespoon Seville orange marmalade, or more to taste', '2 teaspoons grated orange zest', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon reserved duck fat from cooking, or vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon plain flour', '1 tablespoon butter']
